languages.text: {n}Человек, приблизившийся к столу, уродлив по любым меркам — мерзкая рожа, сальные волосы, непомерно вздутые вены. На лице его дружелюбная и очевидно лживая гримаса, от вида которой хочется взяться за оружие. Удивленно покосившись на вас, он произносит:{/n} "Госпожа Хейдари, позвольте поздравить вас с праздником. Господин Пощада не мог проигнорировать столь особенный повод и шлет вам свои поздравления, а также подарок".

{n}The man who has just approached the table is hideous by anyone's standards — a repulsive face, greasy hair, and bulging veins at his temples. His attempt at an amiable smile is so transparently false and off-putting that your fingers itch to reach for your weapon. With a surprised look askance at you, he says,{/n} "Mistress Heydari, allow me to wish you a happy ammaricar. Master Mercy could not let such an occasion go unmarked — he sends his warm wishes, and a gift."
languages.original_text: {n}Человек, приблизившийся к столу, уродлив по любым меркам — мерзкая рожа, сальные волосы, непомерно вздутые вены. languages.text: {n}一个男人朝餐桌靠了过来。无论以什么标准来看着，这个人都称得上是面目可憎。他的脸丑得令人作呕，头发油腻腻的，太阳穴上青筋暴起。尽管他试图露出和蔼可亲的笑容，但他的笑容毫无笑意，令人生厌。你甚至感觉手指发痒，想要立刻掏出武器。他惊讶地瞥了你一眼，随后开了口。{/n}“海达利女士，请允许我祝你及冕礼快乐。像这样的场合，悯慈大师是绝不会缺席的。他向你致以热情的祝福，还送来了一件礼物。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man who has just approached the table is hideous by anyone's standards — a repulsive face, greasy hair, and bulging veins at his temples. His attempt at an amiable smile is so transparently false and off-putting that your fingers itch to reach for your weapon. With a surprised look askance at you, he says,{/n} "Mistress Heydari, allow me to wish you a happy ammaricar. Master Mercy could not let such an occasion go unmarked — he sends his warm wishes, and a gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}一个男人朝餐桌靠了过来。无论以什么标准来看着，这个人都称得上是面目可憎。他的脸丑得令人作呕，头发油腻腻的，太阳穴上青筋暴起。尽管他试图露出和蔼可亲的笑容，但他的笑容毫无笑意，令人生厌。你甚至感觉手指发痒，想要立刻掏出武器。他惊讶地瞥了你一眼，随后开了口。{/n}“海达利女士，请允许我祝你及冕礼快乐。像这样的场合，悯慈大师是绝不会缺席的。他向你致以热情的祝福，还送来了一件礼物。”

languages.text: {n}テーブルに近づいてきた男の容貌は、誰が見ても醜いといえそうなものだった…嫌悪感を抱かせる顔、脂ぎった髪、こめかみの膨らんだ血管。彼の愛想笑いは見え透いた偽りで、不快感を与える。驚きの表情を浮かべながら、彼は言った。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリ、私にも、このアンマリカーであなたにお祝いをさせてください。マスター・マーシーは、このような機会を逃しはしないでしょう…彼から暖かな願いと、贈り物が届いております」
languages.original_text: {n}The man who has just approached the table is hideous by anyone's standards — a repulsive face, greasy hair, and bulging veins at his temples. His attempt at an amiable smile is so transparently false and off-putting that your fingers itch to reach for your weapon. With a surprised look askance at you, he says,{/n} "Mistress Heydari, allow me to wish you a happy ammaricar. Master Mercy could not let such an occasion go unmarked — he sends his warm wishes, and a gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}テーブルに近づいてきた男の容貌は、誰が見ても醜いといえそうなものだった…嫌悪感を抱かせる顔、脂ぎった髪、こめかみの膨らんだ血管。彼の愛想笑いは見え透いた偽りで、不快感を与える。驚きの表情を浮かべながら、彼は言った。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリ、私にも、このアンマリカーであなたにお祝いをさせてください。マスター・マーシーは、このような機会を逃しはしないでしょう…彼から暖かな願いと、贈り物が届いております」

languages.text: {n}El hombre que acaba de acercarse a la mesa es repugnante, lo mires por donde lo mires. Una cara espantosa, pelo grasiento y venas saltonas en las sienes. Su intento de fingir una sonrisa cordial es tan evidentemente falso que sientes ganas de preparar tu arma. Te mira de reojo, sorprendido, y proclama:{/n} «Señora Heydari, permítame que le desee un feliz ammaricar. El señor Mercy no podía dejar pasar la ocasión sin más. Envía sus mejores deseos y un regalo».
languages.original_text: {n}The man who has just approached the table is hideous by anyone's standards — a repulsive face, greasy hair, and bulging veins at his temples. His attempt at an amiable smile is so transparently false and off-putting that your fingers itch to reach for your weapon. With a surprised look askance at you, he says,{/n} "Mistress Heydari, allow me to wish you a happy ammaricar. Master Mercy could not let such an occasion go unmarked — he sends his warm wishes, and a gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre que acaba de acercarse a la mesa es repugnante, lo mires por donde lo mires. Una cara espantosa, pelo grasiento y venas saltonas en las sienes. Su intento de fingir una sonrisa cordial es tan evidentemente falso que sientes ganas de preparar tu arma. Te mira de reojo, sorprendido, y proclama:{/n} «Señora Heydari, permítame que le desee un feliz ammaricar. El señor Mercy no podía dejar pasar la ocasión sin más. Envía sus mejores deseos y un regalo».

languages.text: {n}L'homme qui vient de s'approcher de la table est indéniablement laid : un visage répugnant, des cheveux gras et de grosses veines saillantes sur les tempes. Il tente d'adresser à l'assemblée un sourire aimable, mais le résultat est si visiblement forcé et dérangeant que vous devez vous retenir de sortir votre arme. L'air aussi surpris qu'agacé de vous voir, il déclare :{/n} « Maîtresse Heydari, permettez-moi de vous souhaiter un très bon ammaricar. Maître Mercy se devait de fêter l'occasion, c'est pourquoi il m'a chargé de vous transmettre ses vœux les plus sincères, ainsi qu'un cadeau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man who has just approached the table is hideous by anyone's standards — a repulsive face, greasy hair, and bulging veins at his temples. His attempt at an amiable smile is so transparently false and off-putting that your fingers itch to reach for your weapon. With a surprised look askance at you, he says,{/n} "Mistress Heydari, allow me to wish you a happy ammaricar. Master Mercy could not let such an occasion go unmarked — he sends his warm wishes, and a gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme qui vient de s'approcher de la table est indéniablement laid : un visage répugnant, des cheveux gras et de grosses veines saillantes sur les tempes. Il tente d'adresser à l'assemblée un sourire aimable, mais le résultat est si visiblement forcé et dérangeant que vous devez vous retenir de sortir votre arme. L'air aussi surpris qu'agacé de vous voir, il déclare :{/n} « Maîtresse Heydari, permettez-moi de vous souhaiter un très bon ammaricar. Maître Mercy se devait de fêter l'occasion, c'est pourquoi il m'a chargé de vous transmettre ses vœux les plus sincères, ainsi qu'un cadeau. »

languages.text: {n}Ein Mann tritt an den Tisch heran, der allgemein als grottenhässlich bezeichnet werden kann – sein widerwärtiges Gesicht, fettiges Haar und seine hervortretenden Adern an den Schläfen sorgen dafür. Sein Versuch, ein freundliches Lächeln aufzusetzen, scheitert offensichtlich und wirkt so falsch und abstoßend, dass es dir in den Fingern juckt, deine Waffe zu zücken. Er blickt überrascht und misstrauisch drein und sagt:{/n} "Herrin Heydari, gestattet mir, Euch ein tolles Ammaricar zu wünschen. Meister Mercy konnte doch einen solchen Anlass nicht unbeachtet lassen – er schickt seine herzlichen Wünsche und ein Geschenk."
languages.original_text: {n}The man who has just approached the table is hideous by anyone's standards — a repulsive face, greasy hair, and bulging veins at his temples. His attempt at an amiable smile is so transparently false and off-putting that your fingers itch to reach for your weapon. With a surprised look askance at you, he says,{/n} "Mistress Heydari, allow me to wish you a happy ammaricar. Master Mercy could not let such an occasion go unmarked — he sends his warm wishes, and a gift."

Sein Versuch, ein freundliches Lächeln aufzusetzen, scheitert offensichtlich und wirkt so falsch und abstoßend, dass es dir in den Fingern juckt, deine Waffe zu zücken. Er blickt überrascht und misstrauisch drein und sagt:{/n} "Herrin Heydari, gestattet mir, Euch ein tolles Ammaricar zu wünschen. Meister Mercy konnte doch einen solchen Anlass nicht unbeachtet lassen – er schickt seine herzlichen Wünsche und ein Geschenk."

languages.text: {n}Masaya yaklaşan itici yüzlü, yağlı saçlı ve şakağındaki damarları şişmiş adamın çirkin olmadığını iddia edebilecek tek bir kişi bile olmasa gerek. Dudaklarına sokulgan bir gülümseme kondurmaya çalışıyor ama o kadar itici ve sahte ki parmakların silahını kavramaya yelteniyor. Şaşkın bir şekilde sana yan yan bakarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Üstat Heydari, mutlu ammarikarlar dilememe müsaade edin. Üstat Merhamet'in böylesi bir günü ilgisizce geçirmeye içi el vermezdi. Size en içten dileklerini, bir de bir armağan gönderdi."
languages.original_text: {n}The man who has just approached the table is hideous by anyone's standards — a repulsive face, greasy hair, and bulging veins at his temples. His attempt at an amiable smile is so transparently false and off-putting that your fingers itch to reach for your weapon. With a surprised look askance at you, he says,{/n} "Mistress Heydari, allow me to wish you a happy ammaricar. Master Mercy could not let such an occasion go unmarked — he sends his warm wishes, and a gift."

traits.locale_text: {n}Masaya yaklaşan itici yüzlü, yağlı saçlı ve şakağındaki damarları şişmiş adamın çirkin olmadığını iddia edebilecek birini bulmak pek de kolay olmazdı. Dudaklarına sokulgan bir gülümseme kondurmaya çalışıyor ama o kadar itici ve sahte olduğu o kadar belli ki, parmakların silahını kavramak istiyor âdeta. Şaşkın bir şekilde, sana yan yan bakarak konuşuyor:{/n} "Üstat Heydari, mutlu ammarikarlar dilememe müsaade edin. Üstat Merhamet'in böylesi bir günü ilgisizce geçirmeye içi el vermeyecekti. Size en içten dileklerini ve de bir armağan gönderdi."
